name: Tinkerers of the Moonlight Hoard
description: Stumbling into lost treasure, the Tinkerers of the Moonlight Hoard used the wealth well and quickly rose in stature to local royalty. They also capture moonlight in a moonlight condenser - old technology created by the Gibbun in order to distill moonlight for further processing. Now a member of a group researching the intersection of Groodu and Rootmason magics, they look towards the future with a glint in their eye. Their future is bright. The only question: what comes next?
